EmailTemplate.name: Exsisting Contracts (1343856514.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Exsisting Contracts (1343856514.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jermel, I was talking to my boss about our call and he suggest that it would be better to keep the existing contracts you have with your current clients and just let them know moving forward to send payments to MBO. He suggested this would be faster (since you are in a hurry to get the money over) and easier for your client. If this is ok, you could send them our wire and payment information attached and also sign and return this acknoledgement form <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Contract_Acknowledgement_Form.pdf>, we’ll keep this for our records. Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
